A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In looking at the landscape of all the Star Wars movies\, I would have to place this among the top three. As I described to some people\, it has a very Empire-esque feel to it. I'm not going to concern myself with the other negative audience reviews. People have different likes and interests. I will say 1/2 star rating is utterly ridiculous. The action and effects alone warrant at minimum two stars. I saw the first Star Wars movie when it was first released at the age of 11. I have seen every theatrical release since. I throughly enjoyed this movie and for a couple of hours to feel the wonder of an 11 year old once again. I encourage everyone who likes this series to see this movie.
